Text: The higher ups have been asking for reports on the performance of the team.

Speaker: You
Text: Oh. I'm just organising a report on the team's progress and performance the past few weeks.

Speaker: You
Text: I'm just worried we didn't meet expectations.

Speaker: Frank
Text: How about you inflate how much we actually did just a little bit?

Speaker: Frank
Text: Y'know| fluff it up| make us look better.

Speaker: Frank
Text: We'd probably get a pay raise as well with how 'well' we're doing.

Speaker: Frank
Text: The other's would be happy about getting that raise too!
